document_name: National Action Plan for Energy and Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ARG/2017/ARG-2017-12-25-National Action Plan for Energy and Climate Change_0eb023a1ba2aecab984c90c53f2a3837.pdf
document_description: The objective of this document is to plan the implementation of the measures contained in the National Contribution under the jurisdiction of the MINEM, in order to accompany the development of the country in accordance with the commitments assumed in terms of climate change.
